Lecture 1.Title: Introduction
Lecture 1.Desc: Introduction to this course - going over expectations and schedule.

Lecture 2.Title: The Basics
Lecture 2.Desc: Introducing Unix/Apache/MySQL/PHP stack, getting everything installed on everyone's systems.

Lecture 3.Title: Group Pages, Git, Apache
Lecture 3.Desc: Presentation of initial group pages, introduction to git and apache, HTTP architecture/Markup languages.

Lecture 5.Title: CSS
Lecture 5.Desc: Markup languages continued: wrapping up, HTML, looking at an introduction to CSS.

Lecture 6.Title: Advanced CSS
Lecture 6.Desc: Looking at more advanced CSS and some aspects of it.

Lecture 8.Title: AJAX & JSON
Lecture 8.Desc: Wrapping up introduction to JavaScript, introducing AJAX and JSON file format.

Lecture 9.Title: jQuery
Lecture 9.Desc: AJAX with jQuery, and jQuery in general.

Lecture 11.Title: Quiz 1 Review & Frontend optimization/UX
Lecture 11.Desc: Reviewing for quiz 1 and Frontend Development

Lecture 13.Title: PHP, the sequel
Lecture 13.Desc: Continuing to go over PHP and its applications.

Lecture 15.Title: PHP & MySQL
Lecture 15.Desc: Wrapping up databases by themselves and learning how to integrate PHP with the databases.

Lecture 16.Title: PHP & MySQL, part 2
Lecture 16.Desc: Continuing to learn how to use PHP with databases and the uses of that.

Lecture 17.Title: Quiz 2 review, Login and Logout
Lecture 17.Desc: Reviewing for quiz 2, authentication with PHP/MySQL

Lecture 18.Title: Authorization & Looking ahead
Lecture 18.Desc: Wrapping up authentication, starting and finishing authorization.

Lab 1.Title: Portfolios
Lab 1.Desc: Create a group and individual portfolio website with microformats

Lab 2.Title: Constitution Day
Lab 2.Desc: Create an interactive website that displays the Constitution in a creative way

Lab 3.Title: ITWS Website
Lab 3.Desc: Create a new and improved version of the ITWS website

Lab 4.Title: GNH Website
Lab 4.Desc: Create a website for GNH to their given specifications

Lab 5.Title: Frontend Optimization
Lab 5.Desc: Implement some optimizations for a game created in javascript

Lab 7.Title: MySQL
Lab 7.Desc: Create a gradebook website that implements databases and PHP.

Lab 8.Title: Final lab
Lab 8.Desc: Create a website for this course
